The Green Hoods have been thoroughly analyzing different items in Maple World in search of new ways these everyday items can be utilized.
Our current subject is $item:30000231$, which has rejuvenating effects.
It's used in energy tonics and tinctures as a gimmick. I want to see if it actually has rejuvenating effects!
I just need a few samples to get started.
That's all from me! I leave it to you!
I need you to collect some $item:30000231$ samples for analysis.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I need you to collect some $item:30000233$ samples for analysis.
In small doses, $itemPlural:30000233$ is an important ingredient for a wide variety of potions. However, it thrives in dark places, so we're worried it might be dangerous in larger portions.
I leave it to you!
I need you to collect some $item:30000233$ samples for analysis.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.
For some reason, $itemPlural:30000232$ are extremely popular amongst the young men and women of Maple World. I've tried to figure out why for ages. I even asked Condor, but he wouldn't tell me.
I know why. If you want, sweet Nainai, I can show you in person...
Wh-what's that supposed to mean?!
While you're at it, pick some up for me. I'm fresh out.
I need these $itemPlural:30000232$ for research, not for eating... or whatever it is you do with them!
Ahem...
Not you, too! Ugh! You guys are skeeving me out!
It's clear I need to run a detailed analysis on this. I'll need a lot of samples, please, $MyPCName$.
I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000230$ samples.
At a glance, $item:30000230$ looks like common water. But use it to mix your potions, and you'll see a huge difference in effectiveness.
I think we've only scratched the surface of what this stuff to do! Of course, I'll need a lot of it for analysis if I'm going to prove my theory.
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000230$ samples.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000242$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.
The problem is, nobody knows what $item:30000242$ is or even where it comes from. For all we know, it could be slowly poisoning everyone who eats it!
We've got the equipment to analyze it here, so that's what I want to do. Bring back as many samples as you can.
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000242$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000240$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.
It's actually a popular ingredient at restaurants all over Victoria Island. A little scary, considering we don't know what it even is...
And the only way we'll find out is if we get it under a microscope. Please collect as many samples as you can.
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000240$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000241$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.
I honestly don't know what to make of it. No matter what dish it's used in, the dish always retains its original flavor. So why is this seasoning so popular? And how can we put it to good use?
We really need to study it from all angles, so I'm going to need a lot of the stuff.
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000241$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
We're trying to keep our forces in fighting shape, but we didn't exactly have time to fully stock our armory.
Our troops barely have enough weapons to share between them. That's why I'm collecting used weapons and gear. Hey, everything helps, right?
If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.
If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.
Thank you! This gear will help arm the Alliance's soldiers!
The Alliance grows stronger with your contribution, $MyPCName$!
We're trying to keep our forces in fighting shape, but we didn't exactly have time to fully stock our armory.
Our troops barely have enough weapons to share between them. That's why I'm collecting used weapons and gear. Hey, everything helps, right?
If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.
If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.
Thank you! This gear will help arm the Alliance's soldiers!
The Alliance grows stronger with your contribution, $MyPCName$!
Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
Wow, you must be loaded!
This is enough to fund an entire regiment! Thank you so much!
The Royal Guard is busy rebuilding Tria, the greatest city in Maple World!
I'd be there working right alongside them if I could. But I've gotta stay up here, so I'm sending you, instead.
It's no problem, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. I'd be happy to—
Not talking to you, pretty boy.
Anyway, as I was saying, the city needs $itemPlural:33000063$! Do your civic duty and get some to help reconstruct Tria!
Sure. What's my budget?
Are you yanking my chain, cadet?! Mine the ore and smith the ingots yourself! Honestly, you kids want everything handed to them.
You're still here? Do your civic duty and collect some $itemPlural:33000063$ to help reconstruct Tria!
You worked up one heck of a sweat, cadet! Looks like my lessons are finally starting to rub off on you!
The news is dire, cadet. We block Madria on one front, and she attacks again from another. The damage she's causing is massive.

The sheer amount of resources we've been pouring into reconstructing the areas she's destroyed makes me shake my darn head. It's gotten so bad, we even need to enlist your help, when you're about as useful as a baby cat.
Awww, I love kittens...
Never mind that... Listen close, because I don't like repeating myself. Right now, the city needs $itemPlural:33000064$. Got that?
I suggest you use your skills as a miner and smith to craft the $itemPlural:33000064$.
Carry out $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$'s mission, as directed. And if you happen to see any kittens... capture them and bring them to me for interrogation!
You haven't left yet? The $itemPlural:33000064$ aren't going to collect themselves. Get a move on, cadet!
This'll do. I grudgingly admit you're kind of useful to have around.
There you are, cadet.
Yes, there you are. I need you to—
Excuse me! I'm giving $MyPCName$ a mission right now! Cadet, I'm sending out to collect $itemPlural:33000065$.
Remember, you can get them with your mining and smithing skills. Now, go!
Hmph. I'm sure it was my turn to borrow $MyPCName$...
What are you doing, cadet?! Co collect $itemPlural:33000065$ for the city! Remember, you can get them with your mining and smithing skills.
This will work for now. Thanks.
After Madria's invasion, the city is facing a food shortage. The ranching infrastructure just isn't being fixed quickly enough to meet demand.
I think some $itemPlural:20000352$ could help. They double ranching production.
Amazing!
I'm full of amazing facts. You should know this by now, cadet.
What're you just gaping at me for? Go get a pair of $item:20000352$ to help the city! You know you get them from mining and smithing, right?
What're you just gaping at me for? Go get a pair of $item:20000352$ to help the city! You know you get them from mining and smithing, right?
Nice job, cadet. This should make a big difference!
Do you see this two-thousand-page report I'm holding? It's an outline of all the damage Madria's invasion has caused the city!
Our banks are failing. The whole country's going broke! Don't just stand there, cadet. You can turn this around! Donate $itemPlural:33000066$ to give the economy a kick in the pants!
Dig up the earth and smelt the $itemPlural:33000066$ yourself if you have to. The future of the empire is riding on your sweaty, overworked back!
Dig up the earth and smelt the $itemPlural:33000066$ yourself if you have to. The future of the empire is riding on your sweaty, overworked back!
This should be enough to launch a brand new trade ship. You're making a difference, cadet!

We've got blacksmiths and other volunteers working to fix up the city, but it's still not enough! It doesn't help that the younger blacksmiths keep whining about their legally provided 10 minute break every 4 hours.
Back in my day, blacksmiths didn't take breaks! They got the work done, no matter what! I know a few blacksmiths who didn't sleep for a week, just to get their orders ready on time.
I shudder to think about the condition of the items they made.
Nobody asked you!
Now, I'll let you in on a little secret. When I use a $item:20000358$, it increases my smithing production sixfold!
Get me a $item:20000358$ to give to the blacksmiths. That should ramp things up!
Get me a $item:20000358$ to give to the blacksmiths. That should ramp things up!
Not bad, kid. I bet you didn't take any ten-minute breaks while you completed his mission for me! BAHAHAHAHA!
Even with the Royal Guard providing its full support, our ranchers aren't pulling their weight.

In ranching, you need experienced, knowledgeable workers to get the most out of your animals and crops, but a lot of those people were badly injured in the invasion. The people they've sent as temporarily replacements are about as efficient as... as... as baby chicks!
You laugh, but baby chicks are quite effective when used as a casting medium for the obscure art of ornimancy.
I can never tell if he's joking.
Anyway, what we need now is mastery! Knowledge! Experience! And I know just the thing!
Oh, right. You! We need you!
And don't you forget it.
Get me a pair of $item:20000353$, and I'll show those ranchers how they can double their production. Mine up the ore and smith it yourself if you have to!
Quickly! Obtain some $item:20000353$!
Not bad, cadet. Not bad at all.
That Madria's a crafty one. On their way out, her army razed whole swaths of farmland.
We're facing food shortages all over the empire. Trust me, starvation is a cruel way to go.
You kids don't know hunger like my generation. I reckon we don't have long before you all give up...
If I may! The entire crew—including us "kids"—have agreed to cut our rations in half to help keep the civilian population fed.
W-what? Really? I mean, that's right! I spear-headed that measure myself, for the good of Maple World!
Anyhow, there's no life without food...
And $item:33000147$ is nutritious and cheap. If you're any good at farming or cooking, you can help scrounge some up for the hungry.
Well? What are you waiting for? Get to farming, cadet!
Use your farming and cooking skills to make $item:33000147$!
This will feed a ton of people. Thanks!
I've gotten reports that some folks who fled their homes because of Madria's attacks are suffering from food shortages and a lack of warm clothing. This is not good, cadet!
We need these folks to survive! Otherwise, what are we even fighting for?
I can withstand the harsh winter winds, thanks to my muscular frame and lush facial hair, but you can't expect that from your average civilian.
Weren't you just complaining this morning that the upper deck was too windy?
Anyway, when it comes to muscles, I prefer a build like $MyPCName$'s. Strong, but... flexible!
You don't know what you're talking about! The wind wasn't making me cold, it was ruining my coif. Do you know how much gel my single bang requires?!
Anyway, the best way to beat the cold is by eating hot food. So I thought of something simple, filling, and warm: $item:20000431$!
Make some $item:20000431$ for the hungry folks below!
You better use enough seasoning. I'll be taste-testing the $item:20000431$ myself.
You better use enough seasoning. I'll be taste-testing the $item:20000431$ myself.
Mmm, something smells delicious. You did good, cadet. Maybe you have "Condor's Personal Chef" written in your future after all of this is over.
There aren't enough cakes to go around, so some civilians have been eating $item:30000242$ by the jarful. No way that's good for you. Not that I can blame them, though. The stuff's delicious.
Wait just one moment here. Did you take food from those poor, starving people?
What?! No! It was all for the greater good! Anyway, it's obvious the people are craving sugar because they're coping with their stress...
I can't just stand idly by and let them eat poison! We should give them some nice, sweet fruit to tide them over.
Some apples should do the trick! A sweet, juicy, nutritious snack for everyone!
What're you waiting for? Make some $itemPlural:33000149$ for the hungry! You know how to farm and cook, don't you?
What're you waiting for? Make some $itemPlural:33000149$ for the hungry! You know how to farm and cook, don't you?
Hey, these look pretty tasty. Thanks!
Apparently our last shipment of apples spoiled before they even got to the refugees from our fight against the shadows. Who would've thought, right?
Such a waste. I knew I should've sampled more before I sent them off to be delivered. They ended up going to complete and utter waste. What do we do now?
Hey, you! Luminknight! You got any ideas? What're you munching on right now?
What? Me? These are chips. When I keep them sealed, they stay crisp for a long time. Want one?
This is not time to be munching on—
I just got the best idea! Chips! $itemPlural:20000420$! If we prepare some of those for the people, they'll stay fresh long enough to actually reach them!
Oooh, apple chips. You're a genius, Condor. I see you in a totally different light now.
Why are you still here, $MyPCName$? Shouldn't you be making $itemPlural:20000420$ with your farming and cooking skills right about now?
Hey, if you're making some anyway, why don't you whip up a couple extra batches for the crew and officers of Sky Fortress?
Why are you still here, $MyPCName$? Shouldn't you be making $itemPlural:20000420$ with your farming and cooking skills right about now? I refuse to let anyone starve!
Ah, that looks tasty! I sure hope it curbs my, er, the residents' sweet tooth!
We've got a new problem, cadet.
Times are tough. We've sent off most of our reserve food supplies to civilians in need. Rightly so, but it means the Royal Guards are looking rather scrawny.
It's not as if I can ease up on their training. The men have to be ready to fight at any moment, after all.
But they keep giving me these puppy dog looks, as if they're starving, or sick, or dying...
I could try slicing up some pine mushroom for your men. That's pretty nutritious.
Can't say no to that, I guess. Very well. Go make some $item:33000150$ for my men!
Go fetch some $itemPlural:33000150$ for my men!
My men will be grateful for this. If they're not, it'll be a thousand more push-ups.
It's not easy rebuilding Tria. Everyone's growing weary at the slow progress.
Can you blame them? Their quality of life has corroded. I wish I could put a smile on everyone's face again.
Oooh, I know! I always smile when I eat. Why don't you try giving them some delicious food?
How am I supposed to do that? Everyone's always complaining that the food from our reserve supplies are bland.
Actually, that gives me an idea! Why don't we add $item:20000426$ to the food? That'll make it burst with flavor!
Obviously, only someone familiar with farming and cooking could provide that ingredient.
Actually, that gives me an idea! Why don't we add $item:20000426$ to the food? That'll make it burst with flavor!
Not bad, cadet.
Here to work, I hope?
We're making steady progress on Tria's reconstruction, thanks to the effort of folks like me, but I'm seeing more and more people skipping meals.
Can't say I blame them. Who cares if you're a little hungry when you're busy rebuilding lives? Still, we can't have workers passing out on the job.
Why don't I make them a snack that they can eat while they work?
That's not a bad idea. If you've got the farming and cooking chops, why don't you slice up some oranges for the workers?
Support those who work tirelessly to rebuild by preparing some $itemPlural:33000151$!
Something smells good.
Ah, the $itemPlural:33000151$! Perfect! It should be simple enough to preserve these, right?
I'll have some of my men get on it right away.
The invasion may be over, but the fight continues on...
It's a blasted embarrassment is what it is. We don't have enough medicine to go around.
Our tonics and potions go to the soldiers who were hurt the most. For everyone else... Well, they'll have to get by with $item:33000132$.
Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.
Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.
What took you so long? Lives are on the line here!
Hand over that $item:33000132$. The stuff is basically snake oil, but it's all we can scrounge up. Thanks.
My men still suffer from the wounds they received during the invasion...
They suffer in silence, but I know something that can help them: lavender. It's known for it's pain-relieving properties.
Now, you're supposed to give to them as an oil, but we don't have time for that. Instead, we'll light some $itemPlural:20000405$ in the bunks.
Will that really help them with their pain? Some of them are really hurt.
Of course it will! Now stop dallying and get some $itemPlural:20000405$!
Stop dallying and obtain some $itemPlural:20000405$!
Hand it over.
Mmmm, that's the stuff. With this lavender and some grit, my bath will be fabulous to—I mean, there's nothing my men can't do!
You got a minute?
I sent a squad to fight some bug monsters that were hounding a village in the boonies. Some of them were bitten, and now they itch like mad.
Worse, they can't seem to stop scratching. Say, how are your foraging and alchemy skills, kid?
Eh, they're all right.
Great! Then obtain some $item:33000134$ for my men. It should help with the itching.
Obtain some $item:33000134$ for my men. It should help with the itching.
Smells like you got what I asked for.
I'll get it to my men right away.
Hey, $MyPCName$. C'mere.
Shhh, no, don't look at me!
What's with the secrecy?
Secrecy? What? No! What're you— Never mind. You're skilled at foraging and alchemy, right? Have you heard of $item:20000408$?
I've been taking $itemPlural:20000408$, but it's hard to get enough rosemary for it on my own.
Yeah. I know that stuff! It's used to cure baldness, isn't it?
By the light, keep your voice down! Anyway, can you get me some?
Heh.
Shut it, twerp.
Now go and make me some $itemPlural:20000408$!
Ah, there you are.
Hey, this $item:20000408$ is not too shabby, not too shabby at all. Thanks, cadet. I owe you one.
Achoo!!
Sorry for sneezing on you, but it just goes to show: nobody's immune to the common cold. Let my germs be a warning to you.
I bet some $item:33000135$ would perk you right up.
$item:33000135$? You some sort of alchemist? Sure, might as well give it a shot. I mean, look at me, I'm miserable.
I'll wait here for that $item:33000135$ you promised.
That looks lemony, all right.
Thanks, kid. This should help my men as well.
Are you ready to do your duty for $map:02000001$?
Some of my men were battling toxic monsters, and a lot of them got poisoned. We need to obtain an antidote for them as quickly as we can!
Any ideas, cadet?
Perhaps some $item:20000414$ would detoxify them.
Brilliant! Let's do it!
Obtain some $itemPlural:20000414$ to detoxify my poisoned men.
Well? You got what I asked for?
I'll get this $item:20000414$ to my men right away.
Battle scars are a mark of honor!
But that doesn't mean I can let my men's wounds fester and become infected. I propose we make a cure-all tonic to treat their injuries.
Sure. Just tell me where to pick it up!
You don't already know? I figured you'd... Never mind. Of course I know. $item:33000136$ is used in plenty of potions and tonics, so I bet that stuff will do the trick.
Use your foraging and alchemy skills to bring me some $itemPlural:33000136$!
You got the tonic?
I'll get this straight to my medics. Good work.
When you look around, the devastation caused by Madria goes as far as the eye can see!
Major roads, blocked! Sea paths, in chaos! And none of it has been restored. Major you can't see it, $MyPCName$, but trust me, the effects are massive and far-reaching.

We've put up tents to help house those who've been displaced, but the fabric is starting to fray and tear. Can you use your ranching and handicraft skills to get some $item:33000076$ so we can fix up the tents?
Will you use your ranching and handicraft skills to obtain $item:33000076$ so we can repair the tents?
Every delay causes more suffering!
You've brought the $item:33000076$! Thank you. That should be enough to last for a while.
Look alive. We've got work to do.
I need $item:33000077$. It's a crucial ingredient for a lot of the everyday items you take for granted.
It used to be easy to get. Ever since the attack on the capital, however, we can't seem to get our hands on the stuff. Will you make some for the Royal Guard?
Will you obtain $item:33000077$ for the Royal Guard?
I see you got the supplies I asked for.
Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.
Supplies are scarce, cadet.
Lots of things are made from $item:33000078$, for example. But when's the last time you saw $item:33000078$ just lying around?
I almost never see $item:33000078$ lying around.

Let me fill you in on how we got to this sorry state of affairs. Civilians, driven from their homes by the forces of darkness, get so hungry they'll eat anything—even $item:33000078$. Nothing we can do about that, so we just have to make more.
Support the Royal Guards by obtaining $item:33000078$ for us.
I see you got the supplies I asked for.
Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.
I left my heart... in... beautiful $map:02000001$...
All of Maple World suffers when $map:02000001$ suffers, and $map:02000001$ is suffering right now, with its outer palace walls in complete disarray.
We're always short on materials and men, so it's slow going.
A nice $item:20000345$ would help speed things up. Why don't you make one for me?
Bring $itemPlural:20000345$ so we can fix $map:02000001$'s palace walls.
I see you got the supplies I asked for.
Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.
What a miserable sight...

My men are weak and scrawny. I can barely stand to look at them. The only way for them to get stronger is... $item:33000079$! Mix it in their drinks, sprinkle it on their meals, shove it down their throats... Whatever it takes!
Cadet, get me some $item:33000079$!
Why don't I just get you some milk?

I can't have guards drinking cups of milk like babies! No, $item:33000079$ is the way to go. You can mix it in their drinks, sprinkle it on their meals, shove it down their throats... Whatever it takes!
Stop the chit-chat and bring me the $item:33000079$!
I see you got the supplies I asked for.
Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.
Supplies have become scarce, cadet.
We've directed most of our mining resources toward repairing the city's outer walls. You never know when the enemy will attack again.
But there's been immense damage to civilian homes, as well. This got me thinking, we really need a $item:20000364$.
How is a $item:20000364$ gonna help?
You let me worry about that. Just get me one!
Stop dawdling and bring me my $item:20000364$!
I see you got the supplies I asked for.
Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.
I better take care of that...
Hey, cadet. You liking Sky Fortress?
Yeah, it's great!
We've got it good up here, but the same can't be said for some of my men.
They're down in the cold, working as hard as they can to help the people. Maybe you can help them out by getting some $item:33000080$ so they don't freeze to death.
Maybe you can help them out by getting some $item:33000080$ so they don't freeze to death.
I see you got the supplies I asked for.
Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.
I have a mission for you. $map:02000262$ is on red alert.
That means that there's some bad stuff going down. There are all kinds of alerts, like—
As I was saying, our radars are detecting an entity known as $npcName:22000045$. It seems that other monsters started inhabiting the area after it appeared.
I'm getting all kinds of spooky reports from $map:02000262$—living dolls and the like. Based on the timeline, I bet $npcName:22000045$ is behind this!
We will give these monsters no quarter. Go to $map:02000262$ and defeat $npcName:22000045$ and its minions!
<font size='20'>It's not like I was talking or anything...</font>
Go to $map:02000262$ and defeat $npcName:22000045$ and its minions!
$map:02000262$ is once again under our control. Competently executed. I'll have my analysts look into the effect $npcName:22000045$ had on its surroundings.
Don't let this go to your head. We have more work to do.
I have a mission for you. $map:02000175$ is on red alert.
$npcName:22000052$ has escaped from the Land of Darkness and is turning nearby monsters into savages.
How did $npcName:22000052$ get there?
After the $map:02000146$ opened, other secret passages and tunnels to our world opened along with it.
It's unfortunate that $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ slipped our grasp at Henesys. If I'd been there to oversee things back then...
And what would you have done differently, exactly?

I suspect a fifth-level Faustian Binding in conjunction with a Ward of the Escutcheon's Aegis would have trapped him nicely. It certainly would have been more effective than fighting off his cronies while he made his escape.
Listen, you weren't there, man. It—
That's enough of that. Go to the $map:02000175$ and defeat $npcName:22000052$ and his minions!
Go to $map:02000146$ and defeat $npcName:22000052$ and its minions!
You've contained the threat for now, but the shadows are still clinging to the area. This is far from over.
I'll continue to monitor the situation. When you are needed, I'll call on you again. Dismissed.
This next mission is top priority. The $map:02000275$'s prototype war machine, $npcName:22090123$, is malfunctioning.
It was developed to combat evil spirits. However, it seems that it was exposed to dark magic during a performance test. It is now out of control.
$npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ has asked us to take care of this matter personally. I thought of you first when the request came in, naturally.

While you're there, I'd like you to eliminate the monsters who corrupted $npcName:22090123$ in the first place. This should also serve as a reminder that machines can't replace human soldiers and warriors.
I won't let them replace us, Ma'am!
Go to the $map:02000275$ and defeat $npcName:22090123$ and the other nearby monsters!
There you are. Don't bother filing a report...
Uh... Is something wrong?
$npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ has sent you his thanks for taking care of this.
You don't seem to happy about this.
Um... They plan to rebuild the $npcName:22090123$ and try again. It's only a matter of time before they're asking us for help again...
And when that time comes, we will come to their aid. Again. That is our duty. Dismissed.
$map:02000276$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, brief $MyPCName$ on the situation.
What? Sorry, I was a little... Um, a horde of monsters have taken over the labs at $map:02000276$. We think that $npcName:22000023$ is their leader.

$npcName:22000023$ is a bear who powers herself by eating up electricity. At this rate, $map:02000276$ will be out of power in... wow, 24 hours! No power means no security systems, and no security systems mean... Well, bad stuff.
One of our agents was working undercover at the lab as a janitor, but we haven't heard from him in over eight hours...
That's enough. $MyPCName$, head to $map:02000276$ and dispose of $npcName:22000023$ and its minions.
Go to $map:02000276$ and defeat $npcName:22000023$ and its minions!
My scouts say that $map:02000276$ has settled down. Do you have any news of our undercover agent?
Sorry. I didn't see any janitors while I was down there.
Oh no! What could have happened to him...?
I hope he survived, but we must prepare ourselves for the possibility that he's scrubbing toilets in heaven, $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$. $MyPCName$, good work.
I have a new mission for you. $map:02000018$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$ will fill you in on the details.
That's right. Listen up, because I won't repeat myself.
Boooring! You could listen to this wind bag jabber on all day... or you could spend some time with me!
Maybe I should find out what the mission is first...?
Get your harpy claws off $male:him,female:her$! $MyPCName$ and I have got serious business to discuss.
I'm all ears, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$!
Good choice, cadet. You'll make a fine soldier someday. Maybe. Actually, now that I look at you, you are pretty scrawny...
Um... The mission...?
Right, right, the mission. A red alert was issued at $map:02000018$. The place is falling to pieces. Literally.

There's a beast called $npcName:22000034$ that has a mean sweet tooth. Him and his lackeys are eating $map:02000018$ from the ground up. That old castle is an imperial heritage site, for light's sake!
There's no need to shout, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. $MyPCName$ knows what $male:he,female:she$ must do. I expect that $map:02000018$ will be free of this $npcName:22000034$ soon.
Go to $map:02000018$ and defeat $npcName:22000034$ and its minions!
Congratulations on a successful mission.
And you couldn't have done it without me!
I guess that's true.
And don't you forget it! You keep this up, $MyPCName$, and I'll even consider taking you under my wing.
Ah! That's okay. I'm good.
Don't get ahead of yourself, cadet. I said I'd consider it. But if that's going to be your attitude, maybe you don't have the right stuff, after all.
...Noted.
We have a situation at $map:02000279$. $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ will bring you up to speed.
I'll get right to the point. A shipment of $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$'s robots was hit by some robbers not too long ago.
These robots are loaded with the latest Taliskar tech, and the robbers even managed to get their hands on a cutting-edge $npcName:22000042$. And now, those robots have shown up at $map:02000279$.
This has Blackstar's fingerprints all over it. Still, I can't quite figure out why they'd target $map:02000279$.
The stolen robots aren't responding to any known shut-down override codes. You'll need to dismantle them by hand. Make your way to $map:02000279$ and defeat $npcName:22000042$ and the other machines.
Go to $map:02000279$ and defeat $npcName:22000042$ and its minions!
I believe Agent $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ will be pleased with your success.
I can breathe easy now, thanks to you. I don't suppose you found any clues implicating Blackstar in this whole mess?
I'm afraid not.
That's a shame. Maybe $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$'s team will come up with something when they analyze the scrap you left behind.
Anyway, you busy after this? I'd like to thank you... personally.
Ah... Ummm...
Ha! You should see your face right now!
I have a mission for you. $map:02000171$ is on red alert.
$npcName:22000053$ has long been an enemy to $map:02000051$. With the recent activities of the Inakimo Tribe, he may have been emboldened to act.
This report came from the owner of $map:02000178$ in $map:02000171$. The monsters are driving away all the tourists! And I was planning to visit there, too...
I already tried reaching out to the local experts, but they weren't available for this mission.
Local experts? Are they anyone I know?

It's not my job to keep track of who you do and do not know. But, if I have time, I'll introduce you to them later. For now, head to $map:02000171$ and defeat $npcName:22000053$, as well as any other monsters you encounter there.
Go to $map:02000171$ and defeat $npcName:22000053$ and its minions!
Good job. This should bolster the security of $map:02000051$ for now. One less thing for the war chief to worry about.
This wasn't anything $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ couldn't handle himself.
Ah, perhaps I said too much. There are some things I need to tell you... later. For now, you're dismissed.
I have a mission for you. $map:02000132$ is on red alert.
A series of unexplained phenomena have struck the area. Many of our agents report monsters appearing from thin air.
I suspect that the monster known as $npcName:22090007$ is behind this. "Summoner" is in her name, after all.
Your first order of business is defeating $npcName:22090007$. While you're there, defeat any other monsters you encounter.
Go to $map:02000132$ and defeat $npcName:22090007$ and its minions!
Well done. I'm officially lifting the red alert from $map:02000132$.
Okay, but it seemed like $npcName:22090007$ was drawing power from her surroundings, not the other way around.
If that's true, then we've only seen the beginning of trouble at $map:02000132$... $npcName:11003536$, monitor the region and let me know the moment more monsters appear.
Yes, Ma'am!
I have a mission for you. $map:02000180$ is on red alert.
Our radar systems are picking up a huge concentration of dark magic in the area. It's especially bad around $npcName:22000007$!
We can't allow the enemy to rally their forces. Go to the $map:02000180$ and defeat $npcName:22000007$, along with any other monsters in the area.
Go to $map:02000180$ and defeat $npcName:22000007$ and its minions!
That's one crisis averted, thanks to you. $npcName:11003536$, I want a full report on how this was allowed to happen at the $map:02000180$.
Yes, Ma'am! I'll start going over the data right away.
I have a mission for you. $map:02000113$ is on red alert.
$npcName:22000059$ is on a rampage, so defea—
Not so fast, Captain. There's more to this than you think.
$npcName:22000059$ is normally harmless. My sources say that he was the victim of bullying, and that's what's driven him to the brink.
Who'd dare bully that old snail? Kids these days have no respect! I'll put the fear of the empire, all right!!
Cool your jets, grandpa.
Anyway, $npcName:22000059$ is the victim here. Can't you just... gently bring him back to his senses?
You never cease to surprise me, $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$. $MyPCName$, please take her request under advisement while you carry out this mission.
Go to $map:02000113$ and defeat $npcName:22000059$, along with any other monsters in the area.
Report.
$npcName:22000059$ is back to normal.
And that, ladies and gentlemen, is how it's done! Thanks for helping the old snail out.
And for showing those rapscallions a thing or two about respecting their elders!!
Aaaand here he goes...
The $map:02000112$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, brief $MyPCName$ on the situation.
Yes, Captain! $npcName:22090107$, king of the slimes at the $map:02000112$, is making moves to expand his kingdom. We've spotted his troops attacking other monsters in several neighboring areas.

Now, normally we wouldn't care about monsters fighting other monsters, but slime gunk is getting into the local water supplies. If this keeps up, $map:02000023$ could lose its main source of fresh water.
On behalf of the citizens of $map:02000023$, we need to intervene. Go to the $map:02000112$, defeat $npcName:22090107$, and crush his forces.
Go to $map:02000112$ and defeat $npcName:22090107$ and its minions!
It seems like you've put an end to $npcName:22090107$'s little war. The water quality at the $map:02000112$ is already returning to normal. Well done.
I have a mission for you. $map:02000185$ is on red alert.
Monsters are flooding the area, seemingly from out of nowhere. As it happens, $npcName:22000001$ has also grown more aggressive lately.
It's unclear where they came from, but they're carrying some kind of disease that's infecting the other wildlife. We've seen instances like this throughout Maple World, of course.
This may be our opportunity to learn more about this strange phenomenon. Go to $map:02000185$, defeat $npcName:22000001$, and clear the area of monsters.
Go to $map:02000185$ and defeat $npcName:22000001$ and its minions!
I see you've been successful. I've got our analysts going over all of the data you gathered during your mission. With any luck, things will start to turn around.
Just doing our job, Ma'am! After going through all of these reports, it looks like the monsters came from the abyss—
That's enough. We don't want to say anything we haven't been able to confirm yet.
Ah! Y-yes, Ma'am!
I have a mission for you. The $map:02000173$ is on red alert.
The $map:02000173$ has always been a dark spot on Victoria Island, but ever since the $map:02000146$ opened up, the darkness has become palpable.

$npcName:22000322[gender:1]$ is feasting on this darkness. My scouts say her power has more than doubled since then. I need you to go to the $map:02000173$ and defeat both $npcName:22000322[gender:1]$ and any monsters she's won over to her side.
Go to $map:02000173$ and defeat $npcName:22000322[gender:0]$, along with any other enemies in the area.
Good job. The $map:02000173$ is pacified for now, but I doubt this peace will last long. You're dismissed.
I have a mission for you. $map:02000089$ is on red alert.

As shadow magic floods into Victoria Island, $npcName:22000038$ of $map:02000089$ is acting like an amplifier. Not only is he becoming more powerful, but he's also driving the other monsters near him into a frenzy.
$npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ is an ancient creature, and we can't afford to let his home become overrun by evil. I need you to head to $map:02000089$ and put an end to $npcName:22000038$'s madness.
Go to $map:02000089$ and defeat $npcName:22000038$ and its minions!
$map:02000023$ has returned to normal. Good job. You're dismissed.
I have a mission for you. The $map:02000087$ is on red alert.
Some time ago, Andrea Manor vanished without a trace. The empire's top scientists still don't know what happened to it.
Without the manor, there's been little to stop monsters from moving into the area. Most recently, $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$—a petty gangster from Kerning City—has taken up residence there, too.
He's terrorizing the farmers there. Digging up crops, stealing chickens, leaving crumpled-up soda cans everywhere. What a pig!

I have a hunch that he's somehow connected to the missing manor. Go to the $map:02000087$ and drive $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ out. While you're there, see if you can find any clues about this mystery.
Go to the $map:02000087$ and defeat $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$, along with any other monsters in the area. While you're there, see if you can find any clues about the missing manor.
Any good news?
I cleared out $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ and his goons, but I couldn't find anything about the Andrea Manor case.
That's too bad... Well, you've made the area safe again, so it wasn't a complete waste. Dismissed.
I have a mission for you. $map:02000147$ is on red alert. But this report... $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, please explain.
Ma'am! This request came from the $map:02000209$ on $map:02000147$. They've asked us to arrest a criminal named $npcName:22090165[gender:1]$.
$npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, we are a military operation, not mercenaries for hire. You should keep that in mind before you enter frivolous missions like this into our system.
I-I tried to tell them, Captain, I really did! But this woman, $npcName:11000491[gender:1]$, she wouldn't leave me alone. I had no choice!
I can't have this $npcName:11000491[gender:1]$ interfering with my crew's job duties. $MyPCName$, take care of the situation on $map:02000147$.
Go to $map:02000147$ and defeat $npcName:22090165[gender:1]$, along with any other enemies in the area.
$npcName:11003536[gender:0]$ would like to speak to you.
Thanks, $MyPCName$. You really saved my hide! That $npcName:11000491[gender:1]$ is cranky and mean and... and... old! And she just wouldn't shut up!
Well, that's all over now. Anyway, $npcName:22090165[gender:1]$ wasn't even human. She was some kind of cursed doll.
Noted. Thank you for taking care of it.
$map:02000041$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, brief $MyPCName$ on the situation.
Yes, Ma'am! $npcName:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npcName:22000004[gender:1]$ are fighting all over $map:02000041$. It's put all the monsters in the area into a frenzy.
They're sisters, aren't they? This must be sibling rivalry. They're lucky, in a way...
Ahem! Go to $map:02000041$ and end the chaos started by $npcName:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npcName:22000004[gender:1]$.
Go to $map:02000147$, break up the fight between $npcName:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npcName:22000004[gender:1]$, and defeat any other monsters in the area.
I hear that the fairfolk sisters have calmed down. I'm sure it's only a matter of time before they're at it again... You're dismissed.
$map:02000083$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$, brief $MyPCName$ on the situation.
You've tangled with the gangs of $map:02000083$ before, right? Back in the day, those chumps worked in the shadows, where they belong.
We still don't know how they got up the courage to strut around in broad daylight like that. But, whatever it is, it's basically shut down all of $map:02000083$.
I aim to find out what's gotten into them, and I need your help to do it.
$npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ will gather intelligence. While she's doing this, your job will be to keep them distracted. That is all.
Go to $map:02000087$ and defeat $npcName:22300105[gender:0]$, along with any other enemies in the area.
Good job. It seems that $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ gathered some useful intel.
I still need to sift through it all, but I think I've really got something here. Thanks for lending a hand.
I have a mission for you. $map:02000117$ is on red alert.

Today I'm deploying you to fight $npcName:22000022$, a bear that is upset because it was stung by a bee. My superiors assure me that the bear poses a serious threat to the civilian population and that this mission is top priority. Make of that what you will.
Go to $map:02000117$ and defeat $npcName:11000183[gender:0]$, along with any other enemies in the area.
Well done. Let's hope this $npcName:22000022$ is more careful around bees in the future.
Silly bear. She's always going after that honey!
Yeah... Real silly...
Since this ship was commissioned, we've received more requests for help than we can possibly support.
My duty is to this ship, but I refuse to stand by and do nothing for the people outside of my jurisdiction.
$MyPCName$, I hereby grant you leave to pursue this requests under your own volition.
Walk the world and help those who need it. That will be all.
Walk the world and help those who need it. That will be all.
Welcome back. It seems you've accomplished quite a bit during your leave.
I expect to see more great things from you in the future.
There are many enemy hotspots that the Sky Fortress cannot approach.
As formidable as the ship is, our massive size also makes us vulnerable.
If an anti-aircraft defense system caught us off-guard during a low-altitude approach, there's no guarantee that we would even survive.
$MyPCName$, I need you to take the fight to the places we can't reach. Go to where your strength can do the most good.
Use your judgment to find the places that most need your help.
Welcome back. It seems you've accomplished quite a bit while you were away.
I expect to see more great things from you in the future.
I'm sending you out for a field test.
In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.
Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the 150 mm Alliance Smoothbore.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the 150 mm Alliance Smoothbore.
Our aiming system's margin of error is over 30 points, Ma'am. I don't think that'll cut it in a fight...
I expected as much. We have a lot more calibrating to do.
This is the main gun under the hull of the ship. Once we've got it fully operational, you'll be able to use those flares to request air support as needed.
I'll have another weapon test for you in due time.
I'm sending you out for a field test.
In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.
Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Manastorm Cannon.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Manastorm Cannon.
The Manastorm Cannon missed by just over two kilometers. Is it because our deflector field is still broken...?
The very idea of controlling magic with machinery is obscene. In fact, it borders on blasphemy.
If we try to wield divine powers, are we not inviting divine punishment?
Divine power, you say?
I'm intrigued.
$npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, forward your data to engineering. I want this cannon up and running ASAP.
We'll have more testing missions for you very soon, $MyPCName$.
I'm sending you out for a field test.
In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.
Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Shadow Mortar.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Shadow Mortar.
It failed. Again. I've had it with this blasted mortar!
Be patient. It's tedious work, but good things come to those who wait.
You hear that, Nairin? If you're patient, maybe the captain will finally give you the time of day.
Wh-what are you trying to say?! Sh-she doesn't mean anything by it, really, Ma'am!
...If I wait long enough, perhaps I can have some peace and quiet.
$MyPCName$, we'll resume testing... later.
I'm sending you out for a field test.
In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.
Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Sanctuary Flare.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Sanctuary Flare.
I can't make heads or tails of this computer screen. Did we hit our target or not?
Not exactly, Sir. The shell made it to its destination, but by the time it got there, the healing spell had already failed.
Then we'll try again. The ability to fire healing artillery at our ground forces could drastically cut down on our casualties.
If we had this kind of technology at the Siege of Tria...
Condor...
Our mages will continue their work, $MyPCName$. I'll let you know when we're ready to test again.
I'm sending you out for a field test.
In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.
Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim Nature's Call.
Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim Nature's Call.
I'm watching drone replay now. Healing spores are in position above the target area...
And they're... Oh.
Well? Was the test successful or not?
The spores have scattered, Ma'am. They never reached the target area. I-I'll get my team right on it.
I'll leave it to you, $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$.
Nature's Call is designed to create a safe sanctuary in any battlefield. I'm sure you can see how it would be useful.
In the heat of battle, such a weapon could keep our soldiers on their feet for much longer.
But, as you can see, it's not yet ready for deployment. I'll call on you again for the next test.

Look alive, cadet!
$npcNamePlural:21000027$ have been making a mess of Perion ever since the Inakimo attack put their war party out of commission.
Head to the $map:02000044$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000027$ there. I'll be here, protecting $map:02000001$ from above.
Head to the $map:02000044$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000027$ there.
You sure took your time getting back here, cadet.
At least you got the job done. Keep up the good work.
Listen up!
When the jawbreakers first showed up, I thought they were just your run-of-the-mill hoodlums. But they've really turned $map:02000093$ into a dump.
We can't just sit back and let them take over. Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000312$ and show them that the Royal Guard is not to be trifled with!
Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000312$ to stop their expansion and show them that the Royal Guard is not to be trifled with!
That took a while...
But it wasn't too bad, I suppose.
Hey, cadet. Let me ask you something.
You ever try to train a $npcName:21000066$? It ain't easy. Looks like some of our enemies figured out how, though.
$npcNamePlural:21000334$ have trained whole packs of them to attack travelers! Obviously, something must be done. Head to $map:02000169$ and give them a piece of my mind.
Drive $npcName:21000334$ out of $map:02000169$!
Finally!
You did all right, I guess. Not as good as I used to do, but that's to be expected.
Ten-hut!
Tsk! In my day, soldiers were ready at a moment's notice.
I am ready, Sir!
I guess you're all right, then.
We're heading into a drought, and those no-good, water-slurping $npcNamePlural:21000069$ aren't helping the situation.
They suck up all the water like spiky spunges. Meanwhile, our people are dying of thirst! Even a hard-head like you sees the problem here, right?
Of course, Sir. Clear as day.
Then what are you doing still standing around? Head to the $map:02000049$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000069$! Save our people!
Head to $map:02000049$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000069$! Save our people!
Finally!
You did all right, I guess. Not as good as I used to do, but that's to be expected.
You up for a mission, cadet?
We've figured out why the bonebridge in Perion keeps falling apart... $npcNamePlural:21000267$ keep rolling into it when they get itchy!

That'll make it real tough to finish rebuilding Perion, and we already got our hands full with protecting $map:02000001$. There's only one solution. You need to go to the $map:02000045$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000267$.
Go to the $map:02000045$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000267$.
I hope you're not here to disappoint me.
Nicely done. You're even more efficient than my men!
Listen up!
Sky Fortress's eggheads tell me that the $map:02000046$ is the perfect place for one of those lava power plants that everyone loves.
Too bad the place is overrun with $npcNamePlural:21000299$. Can't build a power plant if you keep getting pinched.
Go take care of it. Head to the $map:02000046$ and drive out the $npcNamePlural:21000299$ so we can build our power plant.
Head to the $map:02000046$ and drive out the $npcNamePlural:21000299$ so we can build our lava energy production facility.
Back already, cadet?
Nicely done. You're even more efficient than my men!
Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
Wow, you just single-handedly funded an entire squad!
Thank you so much. We'll use this money wisely, I promise!
Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
Huh? This is enough to fund a whole platoon!
Thank you so much. We'll use this money wisely, I promise!
Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
I don't know how you got this much, but this will feed an entire company!
Thank you so much. We'll use this money wisely, I promise!
Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?
Amazing. We can fund a whole battalion with this!
Thank you so much. We'll use this money wisely, I promise!
I need you to collect some $item:30000231$ samples for analysis.
It's used in energy tonics and tinctures as a gimmick. I want to see if it actually has rejuvenating effects!
I leave it to you!
I need you to collect some $item:30000231$ samples for analysis.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.
For some reason, $itemPlural:30000232$ are extremely popular amongst the young men and women of Maple World. I've tried to figure out why for ages. I even asked Condor, but he wouldn't tell me.
I know why. If you want, sweet Nainai, I can show you in person...
Wh-what's that supposed to mean?!
While you're at it, pick some up for me. I'm fresh out.
I need these $itemPlural:30000232$ for research, not for eating... or whatever it is you do with them!
Ahem...
Not you, too! Ugh! You guys are skeeving me out!
It's clear I need to run a detailed analysis on this. I'll need a lot of samples, please, $MyPCName$.
I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.
For some reason, $itemPlural:30000232$ are extremely popular amongst the young men and women of Maple World. I've tried to figure out why for ages. I even asked Condor, but he wouldn't tell me.
I know why. If you want, sweet Nainai, I can show you in person...
Wh-what's that supposed to mean?!
While you're at it, pick some up for me. I'm fresh out.
I need these $itemPlural:30000232$ for research, not for eating... or whatever it is you do with them!
Ahem...
Not you, too! Ugh! You guys are skeeving me out!
It's clear I need to run a detailed analysis on this. I'll need a lot of samples, please, $MyPCName$.
I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000241$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.
I honestly don't know what to make of it. No matter what dish it's used in, the dish always retains its original flavor. So why is this seasoning so popular? And how can we put it to good use?
We really need to study it from all angles, so I'm going to need a lot of the stuff.
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000241$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I need you to collect some $item:30000233$ samples for analysis.

$itemPlural:30000233$ grows in dark places, so we wonder if it's tinged with darkness. In small doses, it's safe and effective. However, we'd like to study what the effects are when used in large doses.
In small doses, $itemPlural:30000233$ is an important ingredient for a wide variety of potions. However, it thrives in dark places, so we're worried it might be dangerous in larger portions.
I need you to collect some $item:30000233$ samples for analysis.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000230$ samples.
At a glance, $item:30000230$ looks like common water. But use it to mix your potions, and you'll see a huge difference in effectiveness.
I think we've only scratched the surface of what this stuff to do! Of course, I'll need a lot of it for analysis if I'm going to prove my theory.
I'd like you to gather some $item:30000230$ samples.
Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.
We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!
We're trying to keep our forces in fighting shape, but we didn't exactly have time to fully stock our armory.
Our troops barely have enough weapons to share between them. That's why I'm collecting used weapons and gear. Hey, everything helps, right?
If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.
If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.
Thank you! This gear will help arm the Alliance's soldiers!
The Alliance grows stronger with your contribution, $MyPCName$!
The Royal Guard is busy rebuilding Tria, the greatest city in Maple World!
I'd be there working right alongside them if I could. But I've gotta stay up here, so I'm sending you, instead.
It's no problem, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. I'd be happy to—
Not talking to you, pretty boy.
Anyway, as I was saying, the city needs $itemPlural:33000063$! Do your civic duty and get some to help reconstruct Tria!
Sure. What's my budget?
Are you yanking my chain, cadet?! Mine the ore and smith the ingots yourself! Honestly, you kids want everything handed to them.
You're still here? Do your civic duty and collect some $itemPlural:33000063$ to help reconstruct Tria!
You worked up one heck of a sweat, cadet! Looks like my lessons are finally starting to rub off on you!
The Royal Guard is busy rebuilding Tria, the greatest city in Maple World!
I'd be there working right alongside them if I could. But I've gotta stay up here, so I'm sending you, instead.
It's no problem, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. I'd be happy to—
Not talking to you, pretty boy.
Anyway, as I was saying, the city needs $itemPlural:33000063$! Do your civic duty and get some to help reconstruct Tria!
Sure. What's my budget?
Are you yanking my chain, cadet?! Mine the ore and smith the ingots yourself! Honestly, you kids want everything handed to them.
You're still here? Do your civic duty and collect some $itemPlural:33000063$ to help reconstruct Tria!
You worked up one heck of a sweat, cadet! Looks like my lessons are finally starting to rub off on you!
The invasion may be over, but the fight continues on...
It's a blasted embarrassment is what it is. We don't have enough medicine to go around.
Our tonics and potions go to the soldiers who were hurt the most. For everyone else... Well, they'll have to get by with $item:33000132$.
Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.
Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.
What took you so long? Lives are on the line here!
Hand over that $item:33000132$. The stuff is basically snake oil, but it's all we can scrounge up. Thanks.
The invasion may be over, but the fight continues on...
It's a blasted embarrassment is what it is. We don't have enough medicine to go around.
Our tonics and potions go to the soldiers who were hurt the most. For everyone else... Well, they'll have to get by with $item:33000132$.
Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.
Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.
What took you so long? Lives are on the line here!
Hand over that $item:33000132$. The stuff is basically snake oil, but it's all we can scrounge up. Thanks.
Ten-hut!
Tsk! In my day, soldiers were ready at a moment's notice.
I am ready, Sir!
You better be. A pack of combat-trained $npcNamePlural:21000064$ escaped their cages during the attack on Perion. I told them they ought to put locks on those cages...
Head to $map:02000171$ and take care of those $npcNamePlural:21000064$!
Head to $map:02000171$ and take care of those $npcNamePlural:21000064$!
That took a while...
But it wasn't too bad, I suppose.
Hey, cadet. Let me ask you something.
You ever get bit by a $npcName:21000301$? Those fangs are sharp as the dickens. The little mongrels have practically taken over $map:02000133$...
The folks of Perion think that place is holy, so we've got to do something about it.
I couldn't agree more, Sir. Someone needs to do something!
Thank you for volunteering, $MyPCName$.
Head to $map:02000133$ and get rid of those $npcNamePlural:21000301$!
Head to $map:02000133$ and get rid of those $npcNamePlural:21000301$</font>!
Finally!
You did all right, I guess. Not as good as I used to do, but that's to be expected.
I've got a job for you, cadet!
$map:02000061$ supplies Perion with most of its drinking water. However, it seems we've got a little problem in the area...
If there anything I can do to help, Sir?
That's the spirit! The $npcNamePlural:21000369$ of the pass are riling up the local wildlife and causing all sorts of trouble. Playful scamps!
Destroy them.
I want you to take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000369$ at $map:02000061$!
You sure took your time getting back here, cadet.
At least you got the job done. Keep up the good work.
Ten-hut!
Tsk! In my day, soldiers were ready at a moment's notice.
I am ready, Sir!
Really? You ready to dive head-first into a den of master martial artists who have been hypnotized by evil $npcNamePlural:21000334$?
Just point me in the right direction, Sir.
Bahaha! You remind me of myself, when I was young and inexperienced. Anyway, you're heading to the $map:02000094$ to complete this task.
Defeat $npcName:21000334$ at the $map:02000094$.
I hope you're not here to disappoint me.
Nicely done. You're even more efficient than my men!
In war, a show of great force will always be matched by an equally powerful response, but I didn't expect something like this.
What happened?
My spies report that the Resistance has a new toy...
Seems they call it the "CHKY-002 Fortress Breaker." Oh, I'd just love to find whoever named it and introduce them to my blade...
They made the mech for exactly one purpose: to take down Sky Fortress.
Oh my... These reports say that it has a fusion core MK-II propeller... and unobtanium alloy armor...?!
With that kind of mobility and defense, our anti-aircraft systems won't be able to even scratch it, let alone stop it!
Correct. That's why we aren't going to use them.
$npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, change the settings of the airborne early warning system to alert us the moment CHKY-002 appears, then get me an estimate on the earliest possible attack time.
Yes, Captain!
$MyPCName$, keep an eye on Sky Fortress's status on your World Map. We'll put an alert there when we're under attack.
All of you, listen closely. We cannot lose this ship. When that mech appears on deck, give it everything you've got. It must be stopped. Dismissed!
$MyPCName$, perform routine checks on the Sky Fortress through the World Map. The time of the next attack will appear there.
Nicely done, $MyPCName$. I wasn't thrilled allowing it to land, but I think we've proven that's as far as they'll get.
But... have you considered that perhaps that was more than far enough?
Captain! The signals are scrambled... Our communications system has been hacked!
Was that the best you had, Sky Fortress? Such an easy battle. You didn't even notice I was hacking into your system at the same time.
But... we shot you down!
So sorry to disappoint you, but CHKY-002 is controlled remotely. While you were busting your butts fighting my mech, I was enjoying a refreshing lemonade from the comfort of my own lair!
I've gathered some valuable combat data from our little skirmish, to boot. I'll know all your tricks for next time. There really wasn't much to the Sky Fortress, after all.
I should thank you, really. I'll bring some cotton candy as a reward next time we meet.
What an amusing little circus bear you are. Perhaps, once we've tracked you down, I'll keep you as a pet. Then again, I doubt you're housebroken.
Circus bear? Pet?! How dare you! And I know how to **** in a toilet just as good as you, you ****** ****!
It looks like the curse filter is working properly, Captain! I kind of like it!
Hold on. I've gotta try this. ****! ***! ****** ****-faced ****ing son of a gun! Haw, this is great!
This isn't over! CHKY-002 will only grow stronger with the data all of you provided today!
And you! Four-eyes! I'm watching you. I'll take you down myself! ...Those little twerps. When I get my hands on them, I'll—Wait, is this thing still on?
Just flick the switch. No, with your hand. Not like that. Never mind, I'll just do—
Simpleton.
You know, it wouldn't surprise me if the CHKY-002's next upgrade was called the "Mason Breaker."
Well, even it returns, I have faith the our crew can take it down. Nice work, $MyPCName$.
$npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, have you made any progress on the anomalies our radar has picked up?
Our sensors can't make sense of them, Sir.
Someone's going to have to go down there and check it out in person.
No matter how much technology progresses, sometimes we have to do things the good old way.
$MyPCName$, our radar systems are a mess of warnings and alerts. I need you to head out and check things out for yourself.
Use the Sortie system to minimize travel time.
$MyPCName$, our radar systems are a mess of warnings and alerts. I need you to head out and check things out for yourself.
Thanks for your hard work. It may not have been a serious threat this time, but you just never know what might try to sneak up on us.
I expect more great things from you in the future.
I've got a problem, $male:handsome,female:gorgeous$. I've been so focused on urgent missions and reconnaissance lately that I'm afraid I've been neglecting my other duties.
Dark Wind patrol routes tend to have higher crime rates than other regions. Things could get bad if I neglect them for too long.
Hey, I just thought of something! Dark Wind patrol routes are a lot like you, Nainai!
What's that supposed to mean?!
When you don't pay attention to it, it gets grouchy!
I do not! Ugh!
Anyway, $MyPCName$, you'd better head out. If you encounter any problems, take care of them then and there.
And don't forget about the Sortie system. It'll cut down on your travel time, so I highly recommend using it.
Your mission is simple. Move out, and if you encounter any problems, resolve them on the spot.
That should take care of my patrol routes for a while. Thank you, $MyPCName$.
Keep an eye open any time you pass through those areas, won't you? I'm so swamped, I wish I could clone myself to help with all my work... and come to think of it, a few other things, too.
No, actually... if I had a clone, I'd have her stick to Nainai like glue. That way, Nainai would never be lonely or grouchy.
I'd really appreciate it if you'd stop paying attention to me and start paying more attention to your job!
What did you say? You want my attention? You got it, darling. Now all my attention is completely on you, Nainai. Happy now? Aw, look, she's blushing.
I'd like to ask you a favor, $MyPCName$.
The Lumiknights have long desired to reclaim our lost land. This venture would require a full expedition, complete with knowledge of the terrain and of the enemies who inhabit it.
That's part of the reason I accepted a position on this fleet. It offers an excellent vantage point to perform reconnaissance from up high.
Of course, there's a limit to how much one can learn from a distance. In the end, we need someone to travel into the Land of Darkness by foot, to experience what the place is truly like.
So. Will you be my eyes, $MyPCName$?
Will you experience all that you can through missions? I will see all that you see, as if I'm right there with you. Which I will be, as I'll be astral projecting my consciousness to your position.
Sure. I guess so.
Thank you, $MyPCName$. I leave it to you.
In the Land of Darkness, it's safer to move about physically than magically. I suggest you use the Sortie system.
Will you experience all that you can through missions? I will see all that you see, as if I'm right there with you. You know why I can't go in person.
I gleaned a few nuggets of information, thanks to you.
Perhaps someday you'll become the eyes for all my brethren.
I look forward to that day, $MyPCName$.
Hey, $MyPCName$! You consider yourself a hero, right?
While going on epic adventures is all well and good, a real hero knows that day-to-day tasks are important, too! That's one of the core philosophies of the Green Hoods, and it's served us well!
One of those day-to-day jobs is patrolling the areas we're sworn to protect.
I know patrol work is, well, boring, but somebody's got to do it, right? Otherwise, how can we know when something bad is going down?
In fact, the very fact that you can find Green Hoods on patrol is why the people trust us so much!
That's why I'd like you to go out on patrol today, $MyPCName$!
I'd like you to go out on patrol today, $MyPCName$!
Your efforts have kept the people under the Green Hood's protection safe for another day!
It was nice for me, too, to have a few hours off. But now, it's back to work!
Hey, cadet. Want to know the best way to keep people safe?
Get superpowers. Maybe a freak lightning storm makes you magnetic, or the goddess of light blesses you with superhuman strength.
Wait, there's one other way! You ready for it...? To keep people safe...
...Just do exactly what I tell you to do! BAHAHAHAHA!
Go out and patrol the areas under Royal Guard jurisdiction! If anything happens, deal with it on the spot.
Well? What're you waiting for?
Go out and patrol the areas under Royal Guard jurisdiction! If anything happens, deal with it on the spot, or ask for help.
Not too shabby. Not too shabby at all.
Thanks to you, I was finally able to give the other Royal Guards some leave. They wanted me to tell you how grateful they are. BAHAHAHAHA!
Keep it up, cadet! Tria is counting on you.
Hey there, sugar. I've got an important mission for you.
What kind of mission?
Aww, are you scared, kitten? Relax. It doesn't involve breaking any fingers. I save the best parts for myself.
Your part of the job entails the giant frog, $npcName:23000013[gender:0]$. Dark Wind has, let's say, become interested in him lately.
He's acquired a hefty pile of treasure. There's no way it could've been done legitimately. He's a frog, after all.
And a frog with a shady past, at that.

He's always been obsessed with sparkles and gems. He used to steal them in tiny amounts, so he wouldn't get caught. That's how he flew under my radar for so long. But now, he can't control himself. There have even been reports of him hijacking delivery trucks in broad daylight.
Can't blame a frog for wanting to look beautiful, but literal highway robbery is not the way to make that happen.
I need you to stop $npcName:23000013[gender:0]$ from committing these crimes, honeycakes.
You haven't left on your mission yet? Can't bear to leave my side, can you? Well, then, why don't you and I spend some quality time together back in my room?
Actually, I saw just heading out!
Aww, you're so cute when you blush. Have fun on your mission, but not too much fun!
You made it back in one piece, $MyPCName$! To be honest, I'm a little surprised.
Yeah, the mission wasn't exactly easy.
But you did it, and that's what matters.
I could have given you a heads up about the difficulty, sure, but where's the fun in that?
I'd rather have less fun and stay alive.
Aww, you're so cute when you pout.
If you need someone to make you feel better, I know a quiet place we can go... But why don't you shower off first?
Hey there, $male:handsome,female:beautiful$. Feel like taking on a slightly tougher mission today?
Define "tougher."
You're so cute, $MyPCName$. Don't worry, I'm not sending you to your death just yet.
You're familiar with $npcName:23000054$, right? Big robot? Kind of angry? Likes to hit people?
We want to know why it's been attacking humans. It doesn't seem logical, so we did some digging.
Turns out, $npcName:23000054$ wasn't originally developed as a weapon.
What happened was, when $npcName:23000054$ was originally being manufactured, someone broke into the $map:02000145$ network, which in turn corrupted $npcName:23000054$.
Who would do such a thing?!
I don't know, I can think of a couple people. Hacking a robot to do your bidding sounds pretty useful.
Anyway, Dark Wind believes that's the reason we've seen so much robot belligerence lately.
Someone is forcing the robots to attack.
Who's at the top of the suspect list?
I love how eager you are, but I'm not ready to name names just yet. I need solid proof before we can take any real action against the culprit.
That's where you come in, honey.
If you can disable $npcName:23000054$, we can counter-hack its system and get to the bottom of this.
I'm on it.
Thanks, $MyPCName$. Afterwards, I can reward you handsomely in my office, if you get my drift...
But for now, immobolize that robot!
You haven't left yet? You weren't thinking of getting your reward before you've even done the job, were you? Tsk.
Not at all! I'm heading out now!
All right. I'll see you later, $male:handsome,female:beautiful$.
Done already? Quick and easy, just the way I like it.
I'll send a team to retrieve and analyze its software now.
Thanks, $MyPCName$. We couldn't have done it without you.
$MyPCName$, I'm so relieved you're here! I have a bit of a situation...
What a surprise.
What's what supposed to mean?!
Nothing. Go on...
I know you're being snarky, but I don't have time to deal with that right now. I have bigger problems on my plate!
Really, really big. $npcName:23000018$ big!

According to these readings, it used to be a normal turtle, but it got big and mean from eating a diet of toxic waste, oil slicks, and lost socks. Now it's wandering around and throwing up on everything...
Worse of all, we haven't been able to find a cure for the sickness yet. The $npcName:23000018$ has started to venture to shore, so something must be done!
I can't say I love the idea of fighting an enemy who attacks by puking...
But you're right. This can't be allowed to go on. You can count on me!
Really? Thank you so much, $MyPCName$!
$MyPCName$! Aren't you forgetting something?
You promised to help! Do I have to explain how important this mission is once more time?
Please don't. Look, I'm already out the door!
You're back! Wonderful.
Thanks to you, we've put a stop to the spread of the toxin. For now, at least.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003536$ heaves a huge, exaggerated sigh.)</font>
All right. Spill it. What's the matter this time.
I'm drowning in work. For every item I check off my list, ten more appear!
Can you believe I missed the last Blake concert?! At this point, I can barely remember what he looks like. It's a tragedy!
Aww, poor Nainai. I can take your mind off your sorrows, if you want.
I'll make you forget all about Blake.
Heresy! I could never forget about Blake!
I'm just saying, Blake is a distant, unreachable fantasy. But me? I'm right here, Nainai.
This is where I step in to steer the conversation back on track.
The point is, I'm really busy!
Way too busy to deal with these field missions!
I feel like I'm walking right into this, but maybe I can help...
$MyPCName$! I thought you'd never ask!
$npcName:23000019[gender:0]$ has been terrorizing the townspeople.
To be honest, I understand where $npcNamePlural:23000019[gender:0]$ is coming from, but we can't just let him slaughter innocent people.
$npcName:23000019[gender:0]$ is just a child, though, so a small warning should be enough. Will you take care of it?
Can do.
Thank you! That's a huge load off my shoulders!
You haven't left yet? Tell me I'm seeing things!
I was just heading out.
Good. I thought you'd forgotten that you agreed to help.
Thank you, $MyPCName$! I knew you could do it!
Now... do you want to know a secret? I've been working on a new combat simulator. It'll really boost the combat power of the fleet's fighters!
I'm making lots of progress, too! I almost don't even notice the overtime and all the sleepless nights. The end product is going to be great! But shhh, don't tell anyone yet, okay?
I'll let you try out the simulator yourself when it's ready!
I knew you would hear my call, $MyPCName$.
Huh?
You heard me telepathically summoning you, which is why you're here.
Few humans can hear me telepathically. It means we share a common destiny.
Um, you have a mission for me or something?
You see? We are connected! You knew what I wanted before I spoke it out loud! Yes, yes, I do have a mission for you, $MyPCName$!
You are no doubt aware of the vile $npcName:23000001[gender:0]$, having seen him in my mind. He is a harbinger of darkness, sowing chaos wherever he goes.
They must be stopped before their influence spreads too far, and you are the only one I trust to handle the task.
I would do it myself, but the ley lines in that area are spewing magefire. With so much latent mana about, my spells would grow so powerful that they would shatter Victoria Island...
It's fine. I'll do it.
I knew you'd understand, $MyPCName$. My thoughts go with you, like a warm cloak or a sturdy pair of boots.
Ah, are you still contemplating the significance of the task I've placed upon your shoulders?
Oooh, right! That's what I was supposed to be doing!
There is no need to rush. I will always know where you are and what you're doing, $MyPCName$.
What an encouraging thought.
