Oh, yes. So exciting.
I knew you'd think so!

Please fight the $npcNamePlural:25020003$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020103[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in $map:02020031$. Come back when you've got enough data!

Please fight the $npcNamePlural:25020003$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020103[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in $map:02020031$. Come back when you've got enough data!
Good job! This data will make a huge difference to our teams out in the field. Just as soon as I get around to analyzing it...
Please be careful out there. We're all counting on you, after all!
We really don't have much data on the various hostile entities of this land. Some of our scouts say they've run into some really weird bad guys, but I don't have anyone free to check them out.
Ugh! What if they get away before we can study them?
I could help, if you like.
Would you really?! The hostiles in question are the $npcNamePlural:25020101[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$!
Keep your eyes peeled for anything that makes these enemies special or unique. I'm so lucky I have you, $MyPCName$!
The foes you're investigating are the $npcNamePlural:25020101[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$.
Well? How weird were they?
They seemed like regular bad guys to me.
Was my scout wrong? Hm. I won't give up yet! Not when there's a chance I could discover a really freaky monster!
I was just thinking about you, $MyPCName$. I need your help.
What is it?

It seems like we can't send anyone to $map:02020004$, $map:02020001$, or $map:02020006$ without them getting terribly hurt. Our people there need help, but how can I send them supplies with all those monsters around?

Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$ in $map:02020004$, $npcNamePlural:25020502$ in $map:02020001$, and $npcNamePlural:25020303$ in $map:02020006$ so I can get help to the people who need it.

Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$ in $map:02020004$, $npcNamePlural:25020502$ in $map:02020001$, and $npcNamePlural:25020303$ in $map:02020006$ so I can get help to the people who need it.
Thanks to you, our people in the field can breathe a little easier.
I don't know when more monsters will crop up, but I know who to turn to when they do.
$MyPCName$, $MyPCName$! Look at this!
What is it?
I've got a new hypothesis, and I need your help to prove it before $npcName:11004316[gender:0]$ swoops in and steals the credit!
I was up all night working on this, too. Okay, tell me what you think: the blue monsters of Kritias all have something in common!
It's a brilliant hypothesis, I know, but I need your help to prove it. Please investigate $npcNamePlural:25020302$ in $map:02020006$ and $npcNamePlural:25020505$ in $map:02020001$!
Please investigate $npcNamePlural:25020302$ in $map:02020006$ and $npcNamePlural:25020505$ in $map:02020001$!
And now, for the results!
I didn't really see anything connecting them...
No way! All right, time for another all-nighter. I'll stump that stupid templar yet...

Maybe you've noticed that we're a little... overwhelmed. I've been having people run all over the continent studying things at random. I think we might have an easier time if we brought some order to this chaos.
So I'm setting up categories of monsters for you to investigate. Let's start with the weirdly-shaped robot category!

Please fight $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020807$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$ to find out how they can move with such weird shapes.
Please fight $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020807$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$.
How did the research go?
They were as weird as you said they would be.
Wonderful! Also... that wasn't as useful as I thought it would be! Maybe I need to reconsider my categories...
Well, I'm not giving up yet!
When we first got here, I thought that Kritias was a land of machines. But it turns out there are lots of interesting creatures living here, too!
I can't stop thinking about $npcNamePlural:11004342$. I hear there are a few different species living in the area.
I want to know more! Go out and study the $npcNamePlural:25020704$ in $map:02020032$ and $npcNamePlural:25020905$ in $map:02020013$, please!
Go out and study the $npcNamePlural:25020704$ in $map:02020032$ and $npcNamePlural:25020905$ in $map:02020013$, please!
So, how did the different species vary from each other?
They were different colors.
Ah-ha! I knew it. We must study this in more depth next time!
Hey, could you do me a teeny tiny favor?
Say the word.
I was going through our data on Kritias monsters, and some of our entries are looking awfully thin. That just won't do!
Please gather data on $npcNamePlural:25021102$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021401$ in $map:02020014$.
Please gather data on $npcNamePlural:25021102$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021401$ in $map:02020014$.
You sure brought a lot of data!
Thank you. I'll start uploading this new information right away.
I was looking at our database of mechanical Kritias monsters and found that some of the entries are empty.
We need to fill them with relevant data. $MyPCName$, you'll help me, right?
Study them by fighting the $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in $map:02020051$ and $npcNamePlural:25021201$ in $map:02020017$.
Study them by fighting the $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in $map:02020051$ and $npcNamePlural:25021201$ in $map:02020017$.
That's some mighty fine data! Our understanding of this place grows by the day.
It's only a matter of time before we have perfect countermeasures for these mechanical monsters. I can't wait!
$MyPCName$! We're in trouble!
Calm down and tell me everything.
If these reports are right, then Kharon and Tairen have a plot to use the local plant monsters to attack us!
If those green meanies join the battle, there's no way we'll be able to hold out for long!
Then I should strike first.
Oh, would you? You're a life saver!
Just doing my job.
Thank you very much! Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021801$ in $map:02020008$, $npcNamePlural:25021603$ in $map:02020009$, and $npcNamePlural:25022101$ in $map:02020037$.
Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021801$ in $map:02020008$, $npcNamePlural:25021603$ in $map:02020009$, and $npcNamePlural:25022101$ in $map:02020037$.
How did it go?
Those weeds won't be bothering us anytime soon.
Thanks again! The next time I have some killer gardening problems, I'll turn to you.
I've been looking over our scout reports, and I've come to an important conclusion. Those Daemon Army guys are bad news!
If we take care of them, then Humanitas can focus their efforts on Tairen.
So, shall we defeat the Daemon Army? Please defeat $npcNamePlural:25021901$ in $map:02020035$ and $npcNamePlural:25022002$ in $map:02020036$.
Please defeat $npcNamePlural:25021901$ in $map:02020035$ and $npcNamePlural:25022002$ in $map:02020036$.
Good job! Humanitas is probably grateful, too.
I'm sure it's only a matter of time before the Daemon Army is back. I'm glad we have you on our side!
Have you heard about the giant $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$ in $map:02020006$? They say that if you move his heart, you'll find a great treasure!
I think there's something to this rumor.
The best way to find out for sure is to try it out for yourself!
Please go to $map:02020006$ and find out the truth of the rumor!
Please go to $map:02020006$ and find out the truth of the rumor!
So? Did you move the heart of the giant $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$?!
I did, and he gave me treasure as a reward!
Really?! I can't believe the rumor was actually true! Wow!
Well, this can't be good...
What is it?
